IImageFilter

CRefCount
CRotateFilter

Image filter for rotating an image.

Image Filter Parameters
"Threshold" : int

Threshold for determining whether a pixel is an edge

"Boost"  : int

Amount to boost signal at edge pixels

Functions
CreateRotateFilter
CRefObj<IImageFilter> CreateRotateFilter()

Creates a filter for rotating an image.

Returns

Returns the filter for performing rotation.
